table-entry.name: employee1
table-entry.col-data: emp_id varchar(200), emp_name varchar(200) ,emp_phone varchar(200) ,emp_address varchar(200) ,emp_salary_hours double

table-entry.name: employee2
table-entry.col-data: emp_start_time timestamp not null default current_timestamp ,emp_finish_time timestamp not null default current_timestamp ,emp_salary double ,emp_hours integer ,emp_buy varchar(200) ,emp_net_salary double ,emp_date timestamp not null default current_timestamp ,emp_product varchar(200) ,emp_price_product double

table-entry.name: product
table-entry.col-data: pro_bar varchar(200) primary key , pro_name varchar(200), pro_category varchar(200), pro_supplier_name varchar(200), pro_qty_item int, pro_qty_packet int, pro_All_qty int, pro_price_item double, pro_price_packet double, pro_price_box double, pro_minimum int

table-entry.name: suppliers1
table-entry.col-data: sup_name varchar(200), sup_company_name varchar(200), sup_category varchar(200), sup_phone int

table-entry.name: suppliers2
table-entry.col-data: sup_paid double, sup_total_price double, sup_reminder_price double

table-entry.name: sales
table-entry.col-data: number BIGINT not null primary key, sale_id int not null, sale_date date, product_name varchar(200), qty_kind varchar(200), unit_price double, current_qty int, cost double, t_time TIME

table-entry.name: bills
table-entry.col-data: sale_id int, sale_date date, t_time TIME, total_price double, paid_money double, reminder_money double

table-entry.name: shop_costs
table-entry.col-data: price double, reason varchar(200), total double
